definition: to wipe one's eyes/fig. to remain vigilant
lit. to wipe one's eyes and wait (idiom); to wait and see

sentences.english: As is so often the case with the Big Questions in physics, we'll have to wait and see.
sentences.chinese: 就像衆多物理學的大謎題一樣，讓我們拭目以待吧。

sentences.english: Okay. I'm going to watch for that.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，那我可要拭目以待了。

sentences.english: Beebe for the new season of change wait and see.
sentences.chinese: 所以我對新賽季畢比的改變拭目以待。

sentences.english: I will wait see your words is true .
sentences.chinese: 你的話是真是假，我拭目以待。

sentences.english: WhetIT or not we can trust Don or Penrab remains to be easysting.
sentences.chinese: 咱們也許能信任唐和佩拉伯還需求拭目以待。

sentences.english: We'll see if Pazzini and Cassano are better.
sentences.chinese: 至於卡薩諾和帕齊尼是否更爲出色，我們將拭目以待。

sentences.english: People are still looking to see if there are significant changes in US policies.
sentences.chinese: 人們對美國是否有政策上的巨大轉變而拭目以待。

sentences.english: It remains to be seen whether or not Original Sin will become a thriller classic.
sentences.chinese: 《原罪》能否成爲恐怖片的經典仍需拭目以待。

sentences.english: It remains to be seen what kinds of reforms will actually materialise.
sentences.chinese: 哪種改革會最終成爲現實，我們仍然拭目以待。

sentences.english: We'll have to see, but I wish Wen Jiabo luck.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們拭目看看吧，祝溫家寶好運。
哈哈，讓我們拭目以待吧。

sentences.english: Whether it will greatly curtail gold farming remains to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 至於這是否會在很大程度上遏制打金業還要拭目以待。

sentences.english: However it's going to be interesting to see how long they can keep it up.
sentences.chinese: 然而他們能堅持多久，我們饒有興趣的拭目以待。

sentences.english: Just how much tactile acuity can be achieved remains to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 能夠達到多大的觸敏度還要拭目以待。

definition: to raise one's head and look
to look far ahead/to look forward (to)
suddenly and completely (realize, change one's strategy etc)/also written 幡然[fan1 ran2]
to turn around/to look back/to recollect
